description:
Challenge everyone! Compete is a fun-to-use app which helps creating challenges, invite friends, and compete against the public or in private. Higher, further, faster (and of course also lower, less, slower), or just anything that is measurable – create multiple disciplines, input your accomplishments and view automatically created rankings.
⚠️ Compete is a place where people can improve themselves in a positive way while having a lot of fun. Therefore, do not create or participate in challenges that violate applicable laws or general ethics, or have other unhealthy goals.
* Create challenges with several disciplines * Your disciplines can be anything – let it be in the area of Sports, Health, Fun, Mindful, or Creative things * Set a start date and how long the participants have time to accomplish the disciplines * Invite friends or let the challenge be public (everybody on the same server can join) * Get reminded on each discipline start to accomplish the current discipline * People can look up other acomplishments from their challenges: videos, pictures, text, etc * React to or comment on acomplishments * Rankings are automatically updated after the discipline due date has expired * Supports push notifications via UnifiedPush or ntfy * Self-host the app server (configure for public, private, or user-invite access) Have fun!
